# shared

**Type Property**

The accessory manager singleton object.

## Declaration

```swift
static let shared: DockAccessoryManager
```

## Discussion

Use this property to obtain an instance of [doc://com.apple.DockKit/documentation/DockKit/DockAccessoryManager].
